subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Box 12
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Well that might have been a mistake talking about "spare" boxes! They are 
prototypes, and the damn things don't hold up well, especially if carried 
around to investigations and what not, they weren't designed for that, they 
were made to test out circuit, and configuration ideas. I think everyone 
should kinda chill out till I can get the printed circuit version done. I 
keep getting sidetracked form that project!

Frank
